body.name: RCA PROJECTOR WITH FREE 100" FOLDABLE SCREEN AND BLUETOOTH | Portable Indoor & Outdoor Projector with 150 Inch Projection | Compatible with HDMI, USB, Roku, iPhone, Android, & Apple TV
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 39 mins
features: VERSATILE MULTIMEDIA COMPATIBILITY - Our home movie projector connects seamlessly with a range of devices, including Roku TV, Blu-Ray Player, Apple TV, Fire Stick, iPhone, Android, Smart TV, and other streaming devices. Enjoy hassle-free connections with dual HDMI ports, A/V input, USB, VGA, and an SD card slot, ensuring compatibility with many video, audio, and image formats. Check the full list in the description for more details.

PORTABLE 100 INCH MOVIE SCREEN - Take your movie night anywhere, thanks to our portable outdoor movie projector with simple, hassle-free operation. Plus, it comes with a 100-inch fold-up TV projector screen. So, whether you're camping, on the beach, or in the backyard, our projector for outside ensures the fun never stops!

BUILT-IN BLUETOOTH 5.0 FUNCTION - Our home theater projector is designed with two integrated stereo speakers but you can also connect to an external Bluetooth speaker, enabling you to enjoy movie night without the hassle of tangled cables.

SUPER SIZE PROJECTION - With a 4-inch LCD projection, our indoor/outdoor projector offers the flexibility to project striking visuals that span from 32 inches to 150 inches on almost any flat surface, whether it's a wall, ceiling, screen, or even the side of your house. (Projector Dimensions: 12.5 x 7.5 x 6.75 inches)

CRYSTAL-CLEAR RESOLUTION - Our digital projector offers versatile compatibility, supporting 1080P, 1080i, 720P, 576i, 480P, and 480i via HDMI input. With a native resolution of 800 x 480, our Bluetooth projector delivers exceptional image quality with 33 lumens of white light output, and the 50,000-hour LED projector lamp ensures a lasting cinematic experience at home.
body.description: Elevate your entertainment experience with the RCA Bluetooth Home Movie Projector with Fold-Up Movie Screen. This projector goes beyond the ordinary, supporting up to 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 576i, 480p, and 480i via HDMI input. With 33 lumens of white light output and a 4-inch LCD projection display, this projector delivers breathtaking images with true-to-life colors. It can transform any flat surface into a cinematic canvas, allowing you to project stunning visuals ranging from 32 inches to 150 inches. With a 50,000-hour LED lamp life, our projector ensures a lasting cinematic experience at home. That is 22.8 years viewing 6 hours a day or 5.7 years viewing 24 hours a day! Our home movie projector offers broad compatibility with a range of devices, including Roku TV, Blu-Ray Player, Apple TV, Fire Stick, iPhone, Android, Smart TV, and other streaming devices. Projector comes equipped with dual HDMI ports, A/V input, USB, VGA, and an SD card slot. It seamlessly supports various video, audio and picture formats including AVI, MP4, MKV, FLV, MOV, RMVB, 3GP, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPG, TS, TP, VOB for video, and AAC, MP2, MP3, OGG, FLAC, WMA for audio. Additionally, It supports the following picture formats - JPG, BMP, and PNG. This home theater projector is designed with two integrated stereo speakers but you can also connect to an external Bluetooth speaker. Our portable movie projector offers simple functionality with dimensions measuring 12.5 x 7.5 x 6.75 inches. It also comes with your personal 100-inch fold-up movie screen. That means you can take your mini movie theater on the go and watch your favorite flicks while camping, in the backyard, on the beach, in a treehouse, and more! Experience the magic of larger-than-life visuals and dynamic sound with the RCA Bluetooth Home Movie Projector & Movie Screen, your gateway to endless entertainment possibilities
